EmailTemplate.subject: HeadStart: There's still time to start volunteering
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
It’s not too late to volunteer with HeadStart
{!HS_Activity__c.YP_First_name_from_HS_Application_Form__c}, missed your Welcome Session?
Well don’t panic, because it’s not the end of your journey with HeadStart. Follow the guidance below to achieve your 16+ hours of volunteering, which will allow you to access exclusive skill-building workshops and a guaranteed job interview!
Option One
Contact your Charity to arrange another introductory session
Use the details below to contact your charity. Remember to cover the following things:
Explain who you are and that you’re taking part in HeadStart Apologise for not being able to attend the initial session Ask if it would be possible to arrange another induction
Manager’s name: {!HS_Activity__c.Main_Contact__c} Manager’s Email address: {!HS_Activity__c.Main_contact_email__c} Manager’s telephone number: {!HS_Activity__c.Main_contact_number__c}
Option Two
Find your own volunteering opportunity
Don’t feel like volunteering with your charity partner any more? Prefer to find your own volunteering opportunity with a local charity instead? No problem, just follow the steps below to register this information:
Email us at headstart@the-challenge.org to let us know Tell us the details of the charity you will volunteer with (name, address, email) Start logging hours online on the HeadStart Website using your details below
Log Your Hours
Remember to log your volunteering hours regularly on the HeadStart website using your log-in details below:
Username: {!Contact.Email} Password: {!Contact.Login_Password__c}
If you have any difficulties or need to ask us a question, please email us at headstart@the-challenge.org. Enjoy getting stuck in to your volunteering soon!
